doc.field: MARCADE GROUP INC MAR> BUYS EUROPE CRAFT

Marcade Group said it had agreed to buy Europe Craft Imports Inc for a combination of cash and common stock. The company said Europe Craft designs, imports and distributes menswear and sportswear under the Member's Only brand name. The company said Europe Craft had sales of 70 mln dlrs last year. Marcade said this latest deal is part of an ongoing acquisition phase. Reuter
